General.Name: Yunnan Salt & Salt Chemical Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Energy Investment Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various salt products in China. The company offers natural precious salt, low sodium calcium salt, low sodium salt, iodized and non-iodized raw rock salt, white elephant series, white elephant shangpin series, ground black low sodium salt, uniodized low sodium salt, fruit and vegetable pickling salt, meat curling salt, soothing lavender foot bath salt, glow peppermint food salt, as well as genki coconut milk, hot ginger, free rose, refreshing puer, and healthy sandalwood foot bath salt. It also engages in green energy and food products, as well as natural gas business. The company was formerly known as Yunnan Salt Chemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yunnan Energy Investment Co., Ltd. in August 2016. Yunnan Energy Investment Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Kunming, China.

2.Name: Mr. Li  Zhengliang
